name: Mondrian Mirror Medium
description: The Mondrian Mirror Medium is a playful graphic piece with its geometric mixture of mirror parts and black shagreen, black pen shell and blue pen shell parts that are placed on different levels. Each part has a discreet metal indentation detail adding another element of luxury to the piece. This mirror can be hung different ways to create a different expression each time. The shagreen is hand-dyed by artisans creating a one of a kind piece each time. Currently made to order 8-10 weeks.
